span.p: Please take a look at our Distance Learning Plan, resources, and links. They can be found in the Parents tab under School Resources for COVID-19.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Resources and Links

span.p: Due to the increasing number of COVID-19 cases in the Washington County Area, the Hollandale School District (HSD) has deemed it necessary to temporarily suspend the feeding sites at all locations to ensure the safety of our students and staff members. While there is currently no reported cases from any employees or students with HSD or the feeding program, we are taking all necessary precautions to reduce the chance of any potential exposure. We will continue to monitor the evolution of this virus in hopes to continue the program soon. Until such time, we appreciate your support and understanding.‬

a.title: Go to comments for Temporary suspension of Feeding Sites

strong.span: HSD will follow the request of Governor Tate Reeves.

br.span: Spring Break is extended through March 20, 2020; for the safety of our students and staff

strong.em: HSD Coronavirus updates will be made available via the link below

p.strong: As of March 12, 2020 - Coronavirus Message from the Hollandale School District

p.span: The Hollandale School will be working with the Mississippi State Department of Health, City of Hollandale, Mississippi Department of Education, and other organizations to coordinate the most current and appropriate response to prevent or contain an outbreak of the coronavirus. We have developed four levels of response for the Hollandale School District. For each level, we will have different protocols to ensure students, parents, hourly employees, and teachers are safe, first and foremost. The protocols will also consider student nutrition (breakfast and lunch), wages of hourly employees, and student learning (online and/or learning packets). Rest assured the district will look at all options to support our community during this unprecedented situation. We are asking everyone to be flexible and patient as we develop solutions to address the impact of the coronavirus.

ul.li: Extended School Closures (4 or more days)

p.span: HSD will cancel school on Monday and Tuesday for students only to clean and sanitize the school thoroughly. In addition, the district leadership team will work with the City of Hollandale to develop a plan to address the coronavirus.
p.strong: (All employees are to report to work unless you are experiencing symptoms listed below).
If you have any questions, please contact Nurse Mamie Warren at
